nodes.text: Nirittu Kotta was a male bounty hunter who at one time acted as a partner to the bounty hunter Ro-San Borokki. After suffering a wound to his thigh during an assignment on the planet Ord Vaxal, Kotta sought medical treatment and was operated on inside a storage shed by a rusted DD-13 medical assistant droid maintained by the world's planetary sheriff. However, rather than properly treat his injury, the droid instead opted to amputate Kotta's damaged limb.
